On Thu, 17 Jul 2003, Gordon Mohr wrote:
> > http://crawl08.archive.org/documenttypes/binaries
> > This is throwing a 403 error.
> 
> Is this just listed in the manifest or also linked from test pages?
>

I believe it's only in the manifest.

 
> > And finally, if you specify a directory without the "/" at the end, it 
> > returns a 301 response (Moved Permanently) and then redirects to the "/".  
> > I don't know if this is a problem or not, but the manifest is 
> > reporting quite a few of those.
> 
> If Heritrix running-from-seeds, following-links gets the same 
> pattern of responses, that's fine. If on the other hand the 
> test page links already include the trailing "/"s, then the 
> manifest should include the trailing "/"s too. After all, 3XX
> responses are archived/logged too.
> 

The test page links already include the trailling "/"s, but the manifest 
leaves them out.


Judy
